title: Historians on the origin of the Revolution

content.question: Directions: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the questions you answer. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpts above, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE major difference between Nash’s and Maier’s historical interpretations of the origins of the American Revolution. Briefly explain how ONE specific historical event or development from the period 1754 to 1800 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Nash’s argument. Briefly explain how ONE specific historical event or development from the period 1754 to 1800 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Maier’s argument.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
